scripts.clean-up-post: rm dist/assets/styles.css && cp src/styles.css dist/assets/styles.css && rm -rf dist/custom && cp -R src/custom dist/custom
scripts.build: yarn run clean-up-pre && cd src/custom && yarn run build && cd ../../app && env HAXCMS_CDN=true env HAXCMS_SERVICE_WORKER=true env HAXCMS_GITHUB=true hax11ty build && yarn run clean-up-post
scripts.local-build: yarn run clean-up-pre && cd src/custom && yarn run build && cd ../../app &&  env HAXCMS_CONTEXT=haxcms hax11ty build && yarn run clean-up-post
